articles.title: OpenTable names 2 Massachusetts restaurants among the most romantic in the U.S.
articles.description:
OpenTable’s 2026 Top 100 Romantic Restaurants list includes two restaurants in Boston and Peabody.

The post OpenTable names 2 Massachusetts restaurants among the most romantic in the U.S. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: OpenTable lists two Massachusetts restaurants as top romantic spots for 2026.
Restaurants recognized include one in Boston and another in Peabody.
Local couples may benefit from increased interest and reservations at these venues.

summary: Netflix adds new movies for Boston residents in February 2026.

articles.title: What the Patriots need to do in the off-season, according to readers
articles.description:
“The Patriots need to improve their offensive line. It is the glaring weakness on this team,” one respondent said.

The post What the Patriots need to do in the off-season, according to readers appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots fans identify offensive line as team's primary weakness for off-season improvements.
Readers emphasize the need for strategic changes to enhance team performance in 2026.
Local residents expect these changes to boost fan engagement and team success in Boston.
